entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:39 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
